dmca.title: Google DMCA winentrance
dmca.body:
Genuine Infotech Pvt. Ltd

Ref: GIFT/GE/Oct 06
To
Attn: AdSense Support, DMCA complaints
Google, Inc. 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043
Ref: Your email [#76397190] Need your help to solve the web content duplication / replica of a website-4-10-2006

Respected Sir

Sub: Need your kind help to solve the web content duplication/replica of a website

We Genuine InfoTech Private Limited based at Coimbatore, Registered The Companies Act 1956, in the year 1995 also an ISO Certified Company doing Software Business from 1995.

We promoted and hosted the educational portal www.winentrance.com from 2000 February onwards.

Now we need assistance from you to solve the following problem
Few days back we noticed that one of the website

www.5-golden.com and http://kumeimei.cn/winen/ dumped and duplicated our education portal www.winentrance.com entire website content and hosted the same.

Regarding this already we submitted a compliant through our Webmaster login, feedback@winentrance.com

Note sir, our last 6 years continuous efforts our portal gets first page listing in all major search engines. We kindly request to visit the following websites

Our Portal:
www.winentrance.com
Duplicated/Replica Web Site:
www.5-golden.com
http://www.kumeimei.cn/winen/

and help us to solve this problem. Expecting your kind assistance at the earliest.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed

Once again thanking you Sir. Expecting your immediate action.
Yours Truly

L. Purusothaman
Managing Director
Genuine InfoTech Private Limited
